On this page

G0089:The White Company

Description

The White Company is a likely state-sponsored threat actor with advanced capabilities. From 2017 through 2018, the group led an espionage campaign called Operation Shaheen targeting government and military organizations in Pakistan.(Citation: Cylance Shaheen Nov 2018)

TTPs

Platform Tactic Technique Description Data Sources
Windows, macOS, Linux initial-access Spearphishing Attachment The White Company has sent phishing emails with malicious Microsoft Word attachments to victims. File monitoring, Packet capture, Network intrusion detection system, Detonation chamber, Email gateway, Mail server
Linux, Windows, macOS execution User Execution The White Company has used phishing lure documents that trick users into opening them and infecting their computers. Anti-virus, Process command-line parameters, Process monitoring
Linux, Windows, macOS execution Exploitation for Client Execution The White Company has taken advantage of a known vulnerability in Microsoft Word (CVE 2012-0158) to execute code. Anti-virus, System calls, Process monitoring
Windows, macOS defense-evasion Software Packing The White Company has obfuscated their payloads through packing. Binary file metadata
Windows, macOS defense-evasion, discovery Virtualization/Sandbox Evasion The White Company has performed anti-analysis checks to determine if its malware was in a debugging environment. Process monitoring, Process command-line parameters
Linux, macOS, Windows defense-evasion File Deletion The White Company has the ability to delete its malware entirely from the target system. File monitoring, Process command-line parameters, Binary file metadata
macOS, Windows discovery Security Software Discovery The White Company has checked for specific antivirus products on the targetâ€™s computer, including Kaspersky, Quick Heal, AVG, BitDefender, Avira, Sophos, Avast!, and ESET. File monitoring, Process monitoring, Process command-line parameters
Windows discovery System Time Discovery The White Company has checked the current date on the victim system. Process monitoring, Process command-line parameters, API monitoring
